#ksn:yWRX+KX^qMNL952.text:
Switch between two languages as to always ensure data is coming from a server response, not cache, in case the same request as the last is being made.

If the same request is made again but a different one was made after the last identical one, then the request will not be cached anyways, so we don't have to track that.

QUESTION: Enter a valid YouTube video ID!
